text:
I solved the link issue so simple I just needed to add link="".

`{% dnd_module path='@HubSpot/image',`
  `img={`
    `'alt': 'Illustrated eye icon',`
    `'size_type': 'auto',`
    `'align': 'center',`
    `'src': get_asset_url('../images/branding-icon.png')`
  `},`
  `link="/branding"`
`%}`
`{% end_dnd_module %}`
